players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "This is terrible! Alice was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who the mafioso is among the three of us remaining."
Charlie: "Everyone, I investigated Diana last night and discovered that she is the mafioso. We should vote to arrest her to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, why should we trust your claim as the detective? Diana, do you have any defense against this accusation?"
Charlie: "Bob, if I were the mafioso, I wouldn't reveal myself by accusing Diana. The quickest way for us to win is to arrest the actual threat. Diana, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
